mapper.sql: id, activitySignUpId, activityId, content, picture, createTime, updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into t_activity_review(activitySignUpId, activityId, content, picture, createTime, updateTime) values(#{activitySignUpId}, #{activityId}, #{content}, #{picture}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select ar.*, a.title AS activityTitle, asu.phone AS phone from t_activity_review ar inner join t_activity a on a.id = ar.activityId inner join t_activity_sign_up asu on asu.id = ar.activitySignUpId order by ar.createTime desc
limit ${index}, ${row}

select ar.*, a.title AS a_activityTitle, asu.phone AS asu_phone from t_activity_review ar inner join t_activity a on a.id = ar.activityId inner join t_activity_sign_up asu on asu.id = ar.activitySignUpId
and ar.id = #{value}
mapper.update: update t_activity_review set content = #{content}, picture = #{picture}, updateTime = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
